summary: TWO THINGS:    THE WINDOW OUTER PILLAR MOUNT RANDOMLY FLIES OFF OF THE VEHICLE.  MY GLASS GUY HAS EVEN TRADED OUT THE WHOLE PART AND AGAIN IT HAS FLOWN OFF.  THIS GLASS GUY IS THE ONE WHO DOES GLASS FOR THE FORD DEALER HERE.    2 - THE EXHAUST THAT COMES THROUGH THE REAR AIR VENT NOT ONLY SMELLS BAD BUT MAKES ME AND MY KIDS VERY ILL.
